entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

RAIN SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH IN THE EVENING
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
